expression.expression: CONCAT(CAST(RECENCY_SCORE AS STRING), '-', CAST(FREQUENCY_SCORE AS STRING), '-', CAST(MONETARY_SCORE AS STRING))
NTILE(5) OVER (ORDER BY RECENCY NULLS LAST ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)
NTILE(5) OVER (ORDER BY FREQUENCY DESC NULLS FIRST ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)
NTILE(5) OVER (ORDER BY MONETARY DESC NULLS FIRST ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)
